question: Will Trump announce his VP pick in March?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Donald J. Trump announces his pick for his running mate as Vice President of the United States between March 1, 2024, 12:00 AM ET, and March 31, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

This market will resolve based on the first announcement Donald Trump makes regarding his pick for vice president.

The primary resolution source for this market will be Donald Trump, his campaign, or his official representative(s), however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

events.title: When will Trump announce VP pick?

question: Will Trump announce his VP pick later?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Donald J. Trump does not announce a pick for his running mate as Vice President of the United States between March 1, 2024, 12:00 AM ET, and July 31, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

This market will resolve based on the first announcement Donald Trump makes regarding his pick for vice president.

This market may not resolve to "Yes" until the market timeframe has ended and no VP pick has been announced.

The primary resolution source for this market will be Donald Trump, his campaign, or his official representative(s), however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

question: Taylor Swift + Travis Kelce break up before May?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Taylor Swift and/or Travis Kelce end their romantic relationship by April 30, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

Confirmation can come in various forms, including, but not limited to, social media posts, interviews, press releases, official statements, or a consensus of credible reporting.

question: Will Putin remain President of Russia through 2024?
description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if Vladimir Putin remains the President of Russia without interruption from March 25, 2024 through December 31, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.

The resolution source for this market will be the CIA World Factbook page for Russia, currently available at https://www.cia.gov/the-world-factbook/countries/russia/#government. A consensus of credible reporting will also suffice.

question: Baltimore Bridge ship hacked?
description:
On the morning of March 26, Baltimore’s Francis Scott Key Bridge collapsed after a container ship struck a support column of the bridge. 

This market will resolve to “Yes” if it is confirmed that the container ship's collision with Baltimore's Francis Scott Key Bridge was caused by a hack by April 5, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise this market will resolve to “No”.

"A hack" encompasses intentional, malicious activity which caused the ship to hit Francis Scott Key Bridge. 

The primary resolution source for this market will be official statements from the U.S. Government. However, a consensus of credible reporting may also be used to resolve this market.

question: KuCoin Insolvent before May?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if official information released by KuCoin, official representatives of KuCoin (e.g. lawyers, spokespeople, etc.), or a consensus of credible reporting announces by April 30, 2024, 11:59 PM ET that KuCoin is insolvent or is filing/has filed for any variety of bankruptcy.

This market will also resolve to "Yes" if KuCoin withdrawals for BTC and/or ETH are suspended for a majority of users for at least 7 full days (168 hours) in a row by April 30, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. The primary resolution source for this settlement criterion will be official information released by KuCoin, official representatives of KuCoin (e.g. lawyers, spokespeople, etc.), and a consensus of credible reporting.

If neither of the above criteria are met, this market will resolve to "No".

KuCoin withdrawals being suspended for a majority of users means that a majority of users are unable to withdraw their BTC and/or ETH from KuCoin (E.g. If a majority of users are unable to withdraw their ETH from KuCoin, it will satisfy the condition.)

If KuCoin suspends withdrawals on a day in the last week of April (e.g. They halt token withdrawals on April 29, 2024, 4 PM ET), this market will not resolve until either: 1) withdrawals are reenabled before 7 full days (168 hours) pass, resulting in a "No" resolution; 2) 7 full days pass (April 29, 2024 - May 6, 2024, 4 PM ET) where withdrawals are suspended, resulting in a "Yes" resolution.

This market will also resolve to "Yes" if KuCoin withdrawals for BTC and/or ETH are suspended for a majority of users for at least 7 full days (168 hours) in a row by April 30, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. The primary resolution source for this settlement criterion will be official information released by KuCoin, official representatives of KuCoin (e.g. lawyers, spokespeople, etc.), and a consensus of credible reporting.

KuCoin withdrawals being suspended for a majority of users means that a majority of users are unable to withdraw their BTC and/or ETH from KuCoin (E.g. If a majority of users are unable to withdraw their ETH from KuCoin, it will satisfy the condition.)

If KuCoin suspends withdrawals on a day in the last week of April (e.g. They halt token withdrawals on April 29, 2024, 4 PM ET), this market will not resolve until either: 1) withdrawals are reenabled before 7 full days (168 hours) pass, resulting in a "No" resolution; 2) 7 full days pass (April 29, 2024 - May 6, 2024, 4 PM ET) where withdrawals are suspended, resulting in a "Yes" resolution.

question: Will the $SAFE market cap be less than $1b one week after launch?
description:
Safe, previously known as Gnosis Safe, secures over $100 billion in assets and is set to potentially make its token transferable as soon as April 23 (see https://forum.safe.global/t/draft-unpause-safe-token-contract-enabling-transferability/4892).

This market will resolve to "Yes" if the Fully Diluted Valuation of the Safe token is less than $1,000,000,000 1 week after its token is transferable. Otherwise, the market will resolve to "No."

If the Safe token isn't transferable by December 31, 2024, 11:59:59 PM ET, this market will resolve to "Yes."

This market will resolve according to the Fully Diluted Valuation (FDV) metric of Safe 168 hours after the token is tradable according to CoinGecko (https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/safe).

events.title: $SAFE Market Cap (FDV) one week after launch?

question: Will Fabiano Caruana win FIDE Candidates 2024?
description:
The FIDE Candidates 2024 tournament is scheduled to take place April 3-23 in Toronto, Canada. You can read more about it here: https://candidates2024.fide.com/

This market will resolve to "Yes" if Fabiano Caruana wins the FIDE Candidates 2024. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

If it can be definitively determined at any point that Fabiano Caruana will not be the winner of the FIDE Candidates 2024 based on the rules of the tournament, this market may immediately resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be the official information from the FIDE Candidates 2024 including footage from the tournament (which will be streamed here: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC9B47GnzCRFHTT1BIBWvStQ), however a consensus of other credible sources may be used.

events.title: Chess: FIDE Candidates 2024 Winner

question: Will Trump mention $boden before May?
description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if Donald Trump publicly mentions the cryptocurrency $boden by April 30, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.

A ‘mention’ includes the following:

-A verbal usage of the word ‘boden’ specifically in reference to the cryptocurrency. 
-Any written usage of the word ‘boden' published through Trump's social media or other official communication channels regardless of capitalization and/or specific reference to the $boden cryptocurrency.

The resolution source for this market is a consensus of credible reporting.
